quotes: We have to be fearless. We have to take chances. We can't live life just being afraid of what comes next. That's not what living is about. - Unknown
A positive attitude gives you power over your circumstances instead of your circumstances having power over you. - Joyce Meyer
Sometimes you don't realize your own strength until you come face to face with your greatest weakness. - Susan Gale
Freeing yourself was one thing, claiming ownership of that freed self was another. - Toni Morrison
“Never be limited by other people’s limited imaginations.” —Dr. Mae Jemison
“In recognizing the humanity of our fellow beings, we pay ourselves the highest tribute.” — Thurgood Marshall
“He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.c — Muhammad Ali
“Worrying does not take away tomorrow's troubles, it takes away today's peace. - Randy Armstrong”
